name: Avoid using Structures
description: This rule searches for C++ code using structures.
output:
Associated to each C++ Method/Constructor/Destructor with violations, the Quality Rule provides:
- The Structure used
rationale: Structures should not be used. Using Structures is against Object Oriented encapsulation principles because it exposes its Members to anyone, without any possible control.
remediation: Consider creating a Class encapsulating the Structure
total: Number of C++ methods, constructors, and destructors
